Header: Mother who videotaped sexual intercourse with son jailed
Content: A mother in UK who filmed a porn movie with her 14-year-old son was jailed for five years. The mother, 36, has sent videos of her having sexual intercourse with her son to a cousin in Pakistan. Police has also found indecent images of her three-year-old daughter. During the court hearing she has said her cousin in Pakistan has asked for the material. The woman was caught after her eldest daughter found the videos and images on her brother’s phone. Recorder of Cardiff Judge Eleri Rees has said, ‘These are truly shocking offences. Your duty was to your children. To that you failed in the gravest possible way.'
